function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertainty and ambiguity in epidemiological trends and impact of prevention efforts","Impact":"Ineffective response to disease outbreaks","Mitigation":"Enhance linkages between research and policy, integrate multiple modeling and methods","Technologies":"Advanced modeling and analytical tools","People":"Public health officials, policy makers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of social science integration in disease control policies and programs","Impact":"Inadequate community participation and consideration of social differences","Mitigation":"Incorporate social science perspectives, foster community participation, consider social differences","Technologies":"Social science research and analysis tools","People":"Programme workers, practitioners, country-level managers","Owner":"Social science research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
